workflow-metadata.description:
This workflow uses the Giskard LLM Scanner node to scan a text generation workflow for common vulnerabilities. Giskardâ€™s LLM scan is designed to conduct in-depth assessments of domain-specific models.

You can download and run the workflow directly in your KNIME Analytics Platform. For optimal performance, we recommend using the latest version of KNIME AP.

In order to run the workflow you need an OpenAI API key. If you don't have one yet, register with OpenAI and create a new API key at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

Please keep in mind that OpenAI will deprecate models on a regular basis. For more information about available models visit: https://platform.openai.com/docs/models For information about the cost of using OpenAI models visit https://openai.com/pricing
